extendedInfo.description: Class Act Brackets: Playoff Hoops is the newest App from the Class Act Sports team. It's simple: create an entry and join our public league. Then invite all your friends into your own, private leagues. Just pick the teams you think will win each series in the NBA Playoffs, and in how many games. There is a point system assigned where you are rewarded for picking closest to the correct number of games. At the end of the playoffs, the top-scoring entrants will receive prizes to be announced! The best part: it's FREE! So download this app right now, and tell all your friends! Then head over to ClassActSports.com to check out our exclusive coverage and behind-the-scenes content on all things sports.

reviews.title: Horrible
reviews.comment: Does not pet u pick who u think will win in the series... And its stupid... If there was a 0 on here tht is what ill would rate it.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: I can\'t input text
reviews.comment: This app requires you too make an account but when you select the places to put text the keyboard doesn\'t come up.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Playoff hoops
reviews.comment: Sucks! Wouldn\'t let me do anything and it always did the oppisite of what I said! Worst app I EVER downloaded!!
reviews.author: Jordan Veenstra
